app_description: Here you will find all the information about Judit & Cristian's wedding
app_introduction: In this web you will be able to indicate your diet, allergies and other information for the celebration.
errors_not_implemented_app_text: Unfortunately, this web is not ready yet. You will receive an email to access to all its features as soon as it will be ready.
errors_not_implemented_app_good_bye: We look forward to seeing you soon!
update_ready_text: You only need to update it, click on the button below and you will be able to access to all the options.
add_diet_and_intolerances_form_name: Add diet and intolerances for each person
place_title: The wedding will be celebrated at
place_direction: Carretera a Premià de Mar, 27, 08338 Premià de Dalt, Barcelona
hotel_recommendation_description: Elegant building from 16th century with confortable rooms, living room, gardens and outdoor pool. 3 minutes far away by car
hotel_recommendation_description_2: Exclusive and modern hotel with a restaurant, spa and outdoor pool. 5 minutes far away by car.
bank_account_description: Our best present is that you spend an amazing day with us and enjoy the celebration. However, we share to you our bank account in case you would like to help us to make our dreams come true.
